changes.title: QoL
items: Fixed behaviour of discussion board posts -> contains the corrent submenu instead of profile menu
Fixed titles at pages: Collections, Discussion Board Posts
Fixed behaviour of feed page -> next page no longer opens new webview
Fixed behaviour of trade related pages
Fixed top bar type at pages: Gift Diamonds, Send Item, Send Gold, Mahol's hut, Player Market -> now contain the chat and profile popup buttons
Fixed behaviour of market page -> searching no longer creates new webview
Fixed behaviour of pages: Chests, Buy keys, Buy more power points, Guild settings -> now open in new window
Fixed behaviour of db page suggestions submenu behaviour when ordering -> now correctly highlights selected tab
Disabled pages: Logout, Earn by ads
